/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including a red truck and a white car, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a serene backdrop to the busy street below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
